Description: Stunning 2 bed 2 bath Luxury Penthouse on 2 floors. Features floor to ceiling windows, soaring 20 ft ceilings, amazing views from 2 balconies, hardwood floors throughout, modern gourmet kitchen with Stainless Bosch appliances, dishwasher, designer cabinetry & granite counter-tops. Laundry in the unit. Enjoy the open, loft-like living & dining areas with gas fireplace & loads of sun-light. 1 underground parking spot is included. Located near Fresh Pond, across from Whole Foods & shopping center. Walk to Alewife in 10 minutes & easily accessible to Harvard. (Reference #136408)
